Mwashinga, Jr (a mụrụ na 9 Jenụwarị 1965) bụ onye edemede na onye na-ede uri nke Tanzania si Mbeya, Tanzania nke bi na United States
O bipụtara akwụkwọ nke uri Ndị Kraịst, nkà mmụta okpukpe, ozi ala ọzọ, na akụkọ okpukpe
E bipụtara uri ya n'akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị a ma ama na United States, na mba ndị ọzọ gụnyere Kenya, Singapore, na Tanzania. Ọ na-ede akwụkwọ na Bekee na Kiswahili.
A mụrụ Christopher Richard Mwashinga nye Richard Male Mwashinga Na Christine Mwashinga n'ógbè Igawilo nke Mbeya, Tanzania
Ọ nọrọ afọ 20 mbụ ya na West Kilimanjaro ihe dịka 1,000 kilota (620 mi) site n'obodo ya dị n'ebe ndịda ugwu nke Tanzania. Ọ bụ nwa nke atọ n'ime ụmụ iri na otu nne na nna ya mụrụ.

Maka ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya, Mwashinga gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praemari Ngare-Nairobi dị na West Kilimanjaro tupu ọ kwaga n'ebe ndịda ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Igawilo dị na Mbeya (O-Levels), na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọrịta nwoke na Songea (A-Level) na Tanzania

A zụrụ ya na nkà mmụta okpukpe na Tanzania Adventist College (nke bụzi Mahadum Arusha) na Tanzania na Mahadum nke Eastern Africa, Baraton na Kenya ebe ọ nwetara nzere B.A na nkà mmụta nkà mmụta okpukpe. Mgbe ahụ, ọ kwagara maka ọmụmụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Seventh-day Adventist Theological Seminary na campus nke Mahadum Andrews, nke dị na Berrien Springs, Michigan, US. Na seminarị, Mwashinga nwetara nzere masta abụọ: Master of Divinity na Master of Arts in Religion (Systematic Theology). Ọ na-emecha Ph.D na Systematic Theology n'otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ugbu a.

Mwashinga lụrụ Ruth Michael Mwashinga ma ha mụtara ụmụ atọ: Christopher Richard Mwashinga nke Abụọ, Anna Nakijwa Mwashinga, na Richard Aaron Mwashinga. Mwashinga na-enwe mmasị ịga njem na ọdịbendị ọhụrụ ka ọ na-ekwusa ma na-ede uri Ndị Kraịst ya na akụkọ ifo.
Ọrụ nke Christopher Mwashinga oru ngo 1 (Bekee)
